docs.lead_paragraph: Contributions to the Neediest Cases Fund dropped to $1,892.50 yesterday, the smallest amount received on any one day since the twenty-fourth annual appeal for those in deepest distress in all New York opened a week ago yesterday.

headline.main: 76 DONATIONS SENT TO NEEDIEST IN DAY; Amount Is the Smallest Since This Year's Appeal Began -- Scores of Cases Await Aid.

docs.snippet: Contributions to the Neediest Cases Fund dropped to $1,892.50 yesterday, the smallest amount received on any one day since the twenty-fourth annual appeal for those in deepest distress in all New York opened a week ago yesterday.
